attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to petition for all public swimming pools to have three lanes put aside at all times for people who want to swim lengths.
these shall be "slow", "medium" and "fast", and anyone who is not "fast" who is swimming in the "fast" lane will be removed by the lifeguard.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence "David Roberts" to an action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
